dt-example.title: Ajax sourced data
dt-example.info:
DataTables can read data from a server via Ajax, while still performing searching, ordering, paging etc on the client-side. This is done through use of the `dt-init ajax` option, which has a number of options to customise how the data is retrieved from the server.
The examples in this section demonstrate the use of Ajax loading data in DataTables, with client-side processing.
